## Commit Message Guidelines

> **Important:** The commit message prefix determines the version bump:
>
> - `fix:` â†’ Patch release (e.g., 2.15.0 â†’ 2.15.1)
> - `feat:` â†’ Minor release (e.g., 2.15.0 â†’ 2.16.0)
> - `BREAKING CHANGE:` â†’ Major release
>
> Please ensure your commits use the appropriate prefix based on the type of change above.

## Checklist

- [ ] My commits follow the conventional commit format
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
